activity: Visit to Münster Zoo and Animal Enclosure
description: Take a group trip to Münster Zoo to explore a variety of animals and enjoy the outdoor exhibits.

locationInfo.description: A family-friendly zoo featuring a wide range of animal species, including lions, elephants, and penguins.
safetyTips: Wear warm clothing as it can be chilly.
Keep a safe distance from the animals.
Follow the zoo's guidelines and rules.

description: Enjoy an exciting group ice skating session at the Westfalenhallen ice rink.

locationInfo.description: A spacious indoor ice rink for group skating, with rentals available for skates and other equipment.
safetyTips: Wear warm clothing and gloves for comfort.
Use the protective barriers if you're new to ice skating.
Make sure to warm up before skating to avoid injury.

description: Take a guided tour through the Münster City Museum, learning about the city’s history and culture.

locationInfo.description: Discover Münster's rich cultural history and artistic heritage in this informative museum.
safetyTips: Respect museum rules and do not touch exhibits.
Be considerate of other visitors when moving through galleries.

activity: Bowling and Arcade Games at Bowling Arena
description: Compete in a friendly bowling tournament and enjoy arcade games at Bowling Arena Münster.

locationInfo.description: A fun-filled experience with multiple bowling lanes and a variety of arcade games to enjoy with your group.
safetyTips: Wear bowling shoes for optimal performance.
Ensure all group members take turns fairly.
Use hand sanitizer after playing arcade games.

description: Climb the iconic tower of Münster Cathedral and enjoy panoramic views of the city from above.

locationInfo.description: A thrilling climb to the top of Münster's Cathedral Tower, offering stunning views over the city and surrounding countryside.
safetyTips: Be mindful of narrow staircases while climbing.
Stay together as a group during the climb.
